data.title: Parking at 1301 Pennsylvania Ave. NW Garage
data.shortDescription:
Secure and clean parking garage in downtown Washington, just steps away from the Warner Theatre and National Theatre. Also just a short walk to the White House, Ronald Reagan Building and International Trade Center, and Ford's Theatre. No Re-Entry.

The garage entrance is located on the west side of 13th St NW, between F St NW and Pennsylvania Ave NW, directly across the street from Warner Theater. Look for a glass-paneled building with a big gray decals reading "1301 Parking" by the entrance. Also look for low maroon stand signs that read "Open Public Parking" in white. The official building address is 1301 Pennsylvania Ave NW .

Amenities provided at this location:

  • Covered
  • Unobstructed
  • Accessible
  • Mobile Pass

data.title: Parking at 600 E St. NW Garage- Valet
data.shortDescription:
Easy valet-parking garage offering affordable rates in Penn Quarter. Just a short walk to Capital One Arena, Fords Theatre, Warner Theater, and National Mall. Note that there are 3 LAZ parking locations on E St NW. Please check the address to ensure you are at the correct one. Even if the location is marked as "sold out" to drive-up customers, your space will be waiting for you.

The entrance to this valet-parking garage is located on the south side of E St NW, between 7th St NW and 6th St NW. Look for a brown brick multi-story building with a blue vertical sign reading "Park" in white.

Amenities provided at this location:

  • Covered
  • Valet
  • Accessible
  • Mobile Pass

data.title: Parking at 601 North Building Garage
data.shortDescription:
Secure and affordable indoor garage in Penn Quarter. Just a few minutes to Capital One Arena, Crime Museum, and National Building Museum. If parking overnight, you must drop off and pick up your vehicle within the following hours: Weekdays: 6:30 am to 12:00 am | Saturday: 10:00 am to 12:00 am | Sunday: 10:00 am to 10:00 pm

The garage entrance is on the west side of 6th St NW between Indiana Ave NW and C St NW. Look for a gray sign above the entrance reading "601 North Building, Exit, Parking, Enter" and two vertical black signs reading "Park" in white. The official address of this garage 601 Pennsylvania Ave NW.

Amenities provided at this location:

  • Covered
  • Security
  • Unobstructed
  • Accessible
  • Mobile Pass

data.title: Parking at 875 D St. NW Garage
data.shortDescription:
Secure and affordable indoor parking garage in Penn Quarter. Just a few blocks to the Verizon Center, Ford's Theatre, National Theatre, and less than a mile from the White House. If parking overnight, you must drop off and pick up your vehicle within the following hours: Mon-Fri 5PM-12AM Sat 9AM-12AM Sun 7AM-12AM

This indoor garage is located on the north side of D St NW, between 8th St NW and 9th St NW. Look for a down ramp and a vertical grey sign that reads "Park" in white.

Amenities provided at this location:

  • Mobile Pass

data.title: Parking at 901 E St. NW. Garage
data.shortDescription:
Secure and affordable valet parking in Washington city, conveniently located minutes away from the Verizon Center, the Warner Theater, and the International Spy Museum. This location cannot accept large oversize vehicles and/or those with carry on racks. **Parking in the lower levels requires you to walk up and down the ramps used by vehicles** Location Hours: Monday thru Friday, 6am-11pm Saturday and Sunday, 7am-11pm

This garage is located on the north side of E St NW, between 9th St NW and 10th St NW. The entrance to this garage is at the base of a multi-story gray building, with a metallic sign above the entrance that reads "Parking".

Amenities provided at this location:

  • Covered

data.title: Parking at Atlantic Building Garage
data.shortDescription:
Secure and affordable parking at the Atlantic Building in Penn Quarter. Just a few minutes to the Ford's Theatre, President's Gallery, Capital One Arena, and Warner Theatre.

This is parking at the Atlantic Building located on the left side of 10th St NW, between F St NW and E St NW. Look for a black vertical sign that reads "Parking" in white and a green overhead sign reading "Park" in gold. The official building address is 950 F St NW.

Amenities provided at this location:

  • Unobstructed
  • Mobile Pass

data.title: Parking at Clara Barton Garage
data.shortDescription:
Secure and affordable indoor parking at the Clara Barton in Penn Quarter. Just a short walk to the Landmark Theatre, Capital One Arena, and Madame Tussauds.

This is parking at the Clara Barton located on the south side of E St NW, between 6th St NW and 7th St NW. Look for a vertical green and blue sign that reads "Park" in white and a maroon overhead sign reading "Parking" in white.

Amenities provided at this location:

  • Covered
  • Unobstructed
  • Accessible
  • Mobile Pass

data.title: Parking at Ronald Reagan Building Garage - Keys May Be Held
data.shortDescription:
Safe and secure indoor garage open 24/7. The Ronald Reagan building parking garage is the largest indoor garage in Washington D.C. Located near the Washington Monument, Museum of African American History, National Mall, Smithsonian Museums, White House, and other D.C. landmarks. Maximum height clearance is 7”. No In and Out Privileges. Food court conveniently located within the building. The Ronald Reagan Building and International Trade Center is a premier venue for hosting influential conferences and events, offering a powerful forum for international trade promotion and a landmark destination for the community.

The parking garage has one entrance at 13 ½ Street and Pennsylvania Avenue and two entrances on 14th Street, between Constitution Avenue and Pennsylvania Avenue. Stop at the booth and notify the security officers that you have a ParkWhiz reservation. Once your vehicle is cleared, drive down the ramp. This garage can be accessed via ramps at 14th Street (north and south) and 13½ Street (off Pennsylvania Ave.) Upon entry to the garage, your vehicle will be screened; please plan accordingly.

Amenities provided at this location:

  • Covered
  • Security
  • Restrooms
  • Accessible
  • Mobile Pass

data.title: Parking at The Source by Wolfgang Puck - Valet
data.shortDescription:
Well-run valet parking at the Source by Wolfgang Puck located in East End, next door to the Newseum and just a few blocks away from the National Gallery . Also just a few minutes walk to the United States Capitol and National Mall. This facility is closed overnight. If you stay beyond valet close, you will be required to pick up your vehicle from 870 9th St NW Washington, DC 20001.

This is valet parking located on the east side of 6th St near the intersection with C St NW. Look for the glass-paneled windows with a white building sign reading "The Source by Wolfgang Puck". The official address is 575 Pennsylvania Ave NW.

Amenities provided at this location:

  • Valet
  • Mobile Pass
